title: How to get a mortgage: advice for first-time buyers
text:
So you’ve saved enough for the deposit; what happens next? Unless you have enough cash in your bank account to cover the rest, you are going to have to take out a mortgage to borrow the money.

Not everyone will qualify for a mortgage – a lender will need to judge whether you can afford the repayments.

So how do you get a mortgage, and how to make yourself more appealing to lenders?

What do lenders take into account?

To apply for a mortgage, you can go directly to a bank or building society and choose one of their products, or you can use a mortgage broker or financial adviser. These will be able to compare deals from different lenders across part of all of the market.
